channel.title: muaythai on Darvein
channel.description: Recent content in muaythai on Darvein

item.title: Journey to Martial Arts
item.description: Its been around 3 months already training in Martial Arts, I’m really enjoying this. I started with Muay Thai, it was somewhat hard at the beginning for me as I didn’t practice marial arts in the right way before. I tried a little bit of Ninjutsu, Taekwondo, Karate but never commited more than one month to each… Now I’ve been 3 months (or 4?) already on it and I really regret not being training from my 20s 😢, anyways, never is late I still have the opportunity to go and train no matter the age, although I don’t think I can do anything competitive… that is for young people that are on their 20s.
